name: gerrit-fe-dev-helper
description: Dev helper for gerrit fe development

scripts.assets: npm run assets:html && npm run assets:json && npm run assets:image
scripts.zip: cd dist && zip gerrit_fe_dev_helper.zip -r ./* && mv gerrit_fe_dev_helper.zip ../
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && npm run webpack && npm run assets && npm run zip

author: taoalpha@google.com
